title: Remove my 20 min wait pls riot
body: so when i was in a rank game about 10 min ago. My league just crashed for no reason and said i need to log back in, but when I did it said that I may be offline or something like that. I swear I didn't mean to leave on purpose, pls remove the wait

replies.body:
There's currently an issue where players are receiving an offline message when trying to reconnect back to the game.  The following workaroudn shuold help relieve this:  

Go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Open "LeagueClientSettings.yaml" with notepad
Find the line:

gameflow-patcher-lock:

Delete this whole line
Save the file, restart your LoL Client - and you should be able to log in again.

It's also really important that we fix up whatever is causing you to crash.  Can you give me some more info, like error messages?  You can hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to look into your leaverbuster, but it's still crucial to get the underlying resolved.
